name: Kaeru
description:
Kaeru, the frog, is tired of the wretched smell and sights of the swamp and wants to see the beauty of the mountains and the lush view.  Kaeru sets off on his own little quest to see the beautiful sights of the mountain and seek a new life of light beauty rather than damp and dreary. 

group leader - up2010353 Jade Tilbrook

level designer- up2010769 Conrad Schroder

programmers- up2010769 Conrad schroder, up2015312 Jim
